Package cards.action_cards

Class PayTheBank

java.lang.Object
cards.Card
cards.ActionCard
cards.action_cards.PayTheBank
All Implemented Interfaces:
MachineRandom
Direct Known Subclasses:
BuyAnItem, Hiking, TrafficViolation, VisitAPlace, WatchAShow, WinACompetition
public abstract class PayTheBank
extends ActionCard
implements MachineRandom
Abstract class providing a skeletal implementation of an action card that asks the player to pay money to the Bank

Since most of these action cards require the amount to be randomly generated at the start of the game, this abstract class implements the method in the interface MachineRandom

.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void execute​(Player currPlayer, Bank b)
    Executes the action specified in this card, that is, the player pays a certain amount of money to the bank Since all Pay the Bank action cards follow the same scheme (that is, their logic and the parameters needed are the same), it can be implemented as a concrete method in this class.
    int getAmount()
    Returns the amount of money to be paid to the Bank

    int getIncrement()
    Returns the increment for the possible amount of money to be paid to the Bank
    int getMachineRandNum()
    Returns a randomly generated value within the lower and upper bounds of the possible amount (inclusive) and following the specified increment using the Java ThreadLocalRandom utility class
    java.lang.String toString()
    Returns a string representation of this card, which includes its name and its description as an action card that asks a player to pay money to the Bank

  • Constructor Details

    • PayTheBank

      public PayTheBank​(java.lang.String name, int amountLB, int amountUB, int increment)
      Constructor with the specified name, lower bound and upper bound, and increment for the possible amount of money to be paid to the Bank as parameters

      The name of an action card that asks the player to pay money to the Bank is indicative of the action it specifies: Buy an Item, Visit a Place, etc.

      Parameters:
      name - name of this card
      amountLB - lower bound for the possible amount of money to be paid to the Bank
      amountUB - upper bound for the possible amount of money to be paid to the Bank
      increment - increment for the possible amount of money to be paid to the Bank

  • Method Details

    • execute

      public void execute​(Player currPlayer, Bank b)
      Executes the action specified in this card, that is, the player pays a certain amount of money to the bank Since all Pay the Bank action cards follow the same scheme (that is, their logic and the parameters needed are the same), it can be implemented as a concrete method in this class.
      Parameters:
      currPlayer - current player with turn
      b - bank of the game

    • getMachineRandNum

      public int getMachineRandNum()
      Returns a randomly generated value within the lower and upper bounds of the possible amount (inclusive) and following the specified increment using the Java ThreadLocalRandom utility class

      A separate (private) function sets the amount paid to the Bank to the returned randomly generated value.

      Technically, the number is generated in a pseudorandom fashion, which is adequate for the purposes of the game.

      Specified by:
      getMachineRandNum in interface MachineRandom
      Returns:
      Randomly generated value within the lower and upper bounds of the possible amount (inclusive) and following the specified increment

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      Returns a string representation of this card, which includes its name and its description as an action card that asks a player to pay money to the Bank

      In particular, the representation contains the following details:

      • Type of card (Action card)
      • Name of the card (for example, Visit a Place, Hiking, etc.)
      • The header "Amount Paid to the Bank" (which is a general description of the Pay the Bank category of action cards)
      Overrides:
      toString in class ActionCard
      Returns:
      string representation of this card
